content.html:
Using Two Cards

2


First
Steps


OptionDescriptionDisplay
SEQUENTIAL (default)The card in the second slot is used only when the card in thefirstslotisfull. Ifthe second slotis selected for 8 SAVE DATA SET-UP > SELECT SLOT(� SEQUENTIAL), recording will start on the card in the second slot and switch to the first slot when the card in the second slot is full.1
BACKUPEach picture is recorded twice, once to each card.1 2
SEPARATERAW pictures are recorded to the card in the first slot and JPEG or HEIF pictures to the card in the second slot. This setting takes effect only when FINE + RAW or NORMAL + RAW is selected for I.Q. IMAGE QUALITY SETTING > IMAGE QUALITY. 2 R RAW+JPEG 1 2 R : RAW+HEIF
The camera can be used with two cards, one in each of its two
slots. At default settings, photos are saved to the card in the sec-
ond slot only when the card in the first slot is full. This can be
changed using 8 SAVE DATA SET-UP > CARD SLOT SETTING.

The card used to store movies can be selected using □ MOVIE
SETTING > MEDIA REC SETTING.

40
content.markdown:
# Using Two Cards

The camera can be used with two cards, one in each of its two
slots. At default settings, photos are saved to the card in the sec-
ond slot only when the card in the first slot is full. This can be
changed using 8 SAVE DATA SET-UP > CARD SLOT SETTING.

# 2

First
Steps

| Option | Description | Display |
| --- | --- | --- |
| SEQUENTIAL (default) | The card in the second slot is used only when the card in thefirstslotisfull. Ifthe second slotis selected for 8 SAVE DATA SET-UP > SELECT SLOT(� SEQUENTIAL), recording will start on the card in the second slot and switch to the first slot when the card in the second slot is full. | 1 |
| BACKUP | Each picture is recorded twice, once to each card. | 1 2 |
| SEPARATE | RAW pictures are recorded to the card in the first slot and JPEG or HEIF pictures to the card in the second slot. This setting takes effect only when FINE + RAW or NORMAL + RAW is selected for I.Q. IMAGE QUALITY SETTING > IMAGE QUALITY. |  2 R RAW+JPEG 1 2 R : RAW+HEIF |


The card used to store movies can be selected using □ MOVIE
SETTING > MEDIA REC SETTING.

40
